author: Anjali Patel
title: If You're Not Eating Scrapple, Then You're Doing Breakfast Wrong
text:

Getty ID: 10452457 2. But unbeknownst to them, there is another. A meat championed by the tenacious folk of the Philadelphia region. A meat destined to surpass them both. Hide
Click to reveal
View this image ›
triocountrybutcher / Via instagram.com ID: 10452506 3. Crispy on the outside, soft and juicy on the inside, scrapple is the delightful meat square your breakfast never knew it needed. View this image ›
mariiadiculous / Via instagram.com ID: 10452681 4. Like its name suggests, it’s made from miscellaneous pork scraps. But what its name doesn’t suggest is that it’s a bastion of meaty flavor only further enhanced by a glistening, textural elegance. View this image ›
richardthebarth / Via instagram.com ID: 10452851 5. In other words: she is beauty, she is grease. View this image ›
shewchukmark / Via instagram.com ID: 10453758 6. Scrapple is delightfully simple, meaning your options for it are endless. Want it on a sandwich? Go for it. View this image ›
brewhahacafe / Via instagram.com ID: 10452883 7. Want it as a side to your scrambled eggs? Treat yourself. View this image ›
levyswan / Via instagram.com ID: 10451996 8. Want to beautify it for the perfect brunch photo? Do it! Scrapple is so multifaceted! View this image ›
Wicked Little Cake Company Follow CC / Via Flickr: schmish ID: 10442333 9. And if you just want to shove it in your face all by itself, don’t hold back. That’s literally what scrapple was made for. View this image ›
mellyannjo / Via instagram.com ID: 10442117 10. Scrapple never plays games. It doesn’t pretend to be more than what it is. It is a delicious meat square, and sometimes that’s all you need. View this image ›
straussmouse / Via Instagram: @straussmouse ID: 10454739 11. Pennsylvania knows it, and now the rest of the world needs to know it, too: scrapple is the One Breakfast Meat to rule them all. View this image ›
Steve Wertz CC / Via Flickr: sqwertz ID: 10442581 12. May thoughts of it sizzling lull you to sleep with dreams of a world where scrapple is as ubiquitous as bacon. View this image ›
intakeoverload / Via instagram.com ID: 10442143 So...thoughts on scrapple? I’ve never tried it, but I totally would. Never had it, never will. I’ve tried it and loved it. I’ve tried it and HATED IT.
